content.heading: Doorlock Management System
content.description: Provide Backend core service APIs for the IoT system of Ho Chi Minh City University of Education
paragraphs: Develops web APIs for client apps in order to use for controlling hardware devices in university. Store/retrieve data, logs and schedulers of devices. Develops APIs for communication between BE server and Raspberry gateway via MQTT protocol.
Set up CI/CD workflow to automate building & deploying process. Set up document for client to use in training & developing the IoT system.
techs: Paho MQTT client, EMQX MQTT broker
content.scope: R&D Backend APIs for IoT system of Ho Chi Minh City University of Education

project.client: Ho Chi Minh City University of Education
